Author: Manjunath Rao G
Summary: This script fetches the details of PAGE BLOB across the Azure subscription and saves it as a CSV file. The CSV file will be saved under the location from where the script was run.The general use case could be to understand how many VHD files are present in your subscription. Thes
Title: Fetch Azure Page Blobs from an Azure subscription
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Automation, Azure Blob Storage
